page.title: 06Employment in Craignish area
page.content: Discounting the N.W. corner of the block,no one lives in the remainder. Part of the land of 4 farms & an area of Forestry Commission land adjoin & there is a mussel farm at the point where Lochan Fearphorm empties into Loch Craignish. Unless working locally one would need to travel to Lochgilphead or Oban (15/25miles) to obtain employment. 37 persons living in the'village sq' are in full-time work as follows:- hotel 8,farm/croft 4,shop work 4,build ers 3,Yacht Centre 3, forestry 2, & boatbuilder, business consultant, co. director, consultant marine engineer, estate worker, farm contractor, fire- appliance rep., gardener, gardening contractor, postman, stable worker, teacher, washing machine engineer. Part-time work:- hotel, school meals/ cleaner,school bus driver.
